title: (x) The Grace Hotel - Peignot (customized {Grant}
content:
Hello all.   
   
I am trying to id the attached font, any leads would be much appreciated?   
(and yes, it seems to have been 'squashed?')   
   
Cheers.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141154im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48434.jpg)

 [‹ Onedotzero logo?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141154/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6551 "Go to previous forum topic") [Colorado Avalanche Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141154/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6555 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jem

comments.content:
It's a modified (note the horizontal end of the stroke of the 'G') and squashed version of [Peignot Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141154/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/peignot/d-light/testdrive.html?s=THE%20GRACE%20HOTEL&p=60). Here's a comparison of the original logo with a squashed version of Peignot.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108141154im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48438.gif)
